name: Hunter's Game
description:
Hunters game is an addictive and extremely impressive hunting game.

Beware of your opponents, kill them all and collect diamonds.

Buy new weapons and join auctions to win Real Gifts, by using your diamonds.

Use your boosters and show no mercy to your opponents.


Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains social media link to connect with in-app purchases that cost real money, as well as advertising for other, in-app purchases that cost real money, as well as advertising for Devil Delight Entertainment and some third parties.
